name: Mindform
storyline:
A fantasy forms in your mind: becoming an (e)sports world champion. Experience this journey with a first-person,
climbing game set inside your brain. Feel the thrill of overcoming obstacles and reaching new heights. Discover
your inner resilience and unravel the mindset of a true champion.

Many dream of excelling in (e)sports, but the path to success is challenging—it's like climbing a mountain!
Countless hours of practice and steady progress are required, one step at a time. Along the way, you’ll
encounter setbacks, frustration, and thoughts of, "I’m a total failure," which can feel like falling during the
climb.

Immerse yourself in this metaphorical journey of reaching your dream goal! Experience a first-person climbing
adventure to the top. The true joy and satisfaction come from overcoming tough obstacles and seeing your
progress with each step.

So, do you have what it takes? Form your mind by learning that mistakes and failures are crucial for reaching
the top. Who knows what you can achieve?
summary: Experience the thrill of climbing with Mindform: a first-person climbing game. Challenge yourself, even when it hurts, and learn to embrace setbacks, cultivating perseverance and celebrating the joy of overcoming obstacles—the essential ingredients of a pro athlete's mindset.
